attributes.title: Baby daddy
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if I could finally come in contact with trumpy-poo after 3 years of not paying child support but instead I only saw pictures of hairy feet,which I liked 😻,but i still couldn't contact him and have not gotten my child support 😿😾

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!
attributes.review: when i downloaded it to keep updated on our president, it kept causing my phone to crash!!!😡😡 some might say this is fake news, but i heard from an informed friend that the libs❄️ actually created this app to STEAL our information! don’t download this app if you love trump 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸TRUMP 2020

attributes.title: Great app to keep up with the campaign
attributes.review: Really cool way to stream events for free. I’m using it to help volunteer for the Trump campaign to help get my neighbors involved.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏾‍♀️✨dOnT WaIsT yOuR TiMe✨🧚🏾‍♀️✨
attributes.review:
It took so long to download. I went to Jupiter. Had a cookout. Wrote a WATTPAD book 📖. Started a Booming Yoga Business. Read all the comics on Wattpad. Came back to earth🌎 and it still wasn’t done. UNACCEPTABLE. Then theapp was using
     -Mild drug use and tobacco 
     -Mild profanity and Crude Humor
     -Mature and Suggested Theams
Over all I am very unhappy with this application.

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app was horrible I tried downloading it and after it keep kicking me out and then it deleted all my contacts but it also deleted my emails and stuff but thankfully i got my contacts back but i don’t where my email went I’m scared!!!😭

attributes.title: I got my pickle stuck in a toaster
attributes.review: Completely unrelated, I just wanted to vent about my experience, the entire time I was trying to rip the toaster off, but it was still on, and the charred skin was getting tangled and it was real messy to clean up, but at least I didn’t have to pay for an ambul- oh nvm...

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever gotten in my entire life. For starters, every time I load the app it crashes and my phone dies. Second of all, it took me 7 months to download it. 7 months!! I suggest getting tik tok instead because this app doesn’t even work.

attributes.title: Wants personal info
attributes.review: Privacy breach 100%. It took ages to download and immediately crashes. It was asking for my personal information too.. like why do you need that? All my apps are running slow now. I had to delete immediately.

attributes.title: Do get this app!! 😾😾😾
attributes.review: Fit at I downloaded the app and they asked for ALLLLL my personal info such as, “when did your dad leave?” And “are you a trump supporter?” EVEN MY ADDRESS!!! And then after the 69th day of having this app, my fridge opened and started running toward me singing “ITS ME BABY KATA” I was scared for my LIFE!!! Also we need to save Barron trump 😻😻😻😾😼✨

attributes.title: FOUR MORE YEARS❤️🇺🇸
attributes.review:
To all the Zoomers who think they’re doing anything substantial to detriment the presidents campaign—stay in your basement. America First. MAGA. 

Signed, 
Trump Supporting Millennial
